title: Honoring proud American Soldiers.
body:
Hello everyone. I wanted to make this thread to honor our most honorable soldiers, who battle for American freedom. These people have gone above and beyond to keep America... American.
http://projectfandom.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/07/guile-alpha3-fixed-1024x1024.jpg

Guile.

This guy is Super American. know why? He was the MOST American soldier in the street fighter series. Slappin fools for the good ol' America. Literally everything on this guy calls for patriot. He even has the flag, the U.S.A flag, tattooed on his arms. That's some serious patriotic stuff, seriously, props to him.

http://cdn.smosh.com/sites/default/files/bloguploads/patriotic-gameart-mario.jpg

Mario.

Ok. I have no idea why Mario is holding this flag. Maybe he found it and just wanted to carry it around? Maybe he stole it from someone this 4th of July. But... why would he want to steal this flag? But wait... OF COURSE!

http://i.imgur.com/lymzLW8.gif

Thank you Mario. Up next we have someone who pretty obviously deserves to be on this list.

http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-kF-JVSRcmI0/Tq15hOuzKXI/AAAAAAAAA-c/-Tv4jbkM0Ew/s1600/Captain+America+movie.jpeg

Yep. Captain America. Captain America always fights for justice. Every day, you can expect him to stand up for what he believes is right. Here is a little thing I found from Cap that you might like
http://www.stuffeddrunkandmerry.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/12/captain-america-wikilieaks.jpg
Yep. JUSTICE. I mean, even his shield is Red, white, and blue with a star in the middle. How much more American can you get? Let me find an image for that shield... just a sec...
 
WAIT... 

WHO IS THAT?!?!??!?!?!!>!?!>?

http://stream1.gifsoup.com/view8/20160310/5299733/captain-america-civil-war-spiderman-takes-shield-o.gif

NO!!!! WHAT DO YOU THINK YOUR DOING!?!?!

https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-VFC_eyN2d4Q/VuRlXRKQ-OI/AAAAAAAAZB0/FBuGOsdDyfMyLtwEUv8dC2baxxHG4o9ew/s1600/tumblr_o3xp3wNEAZ1tjq4jgo1_540.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/WiODG.jpg

Guile is too. He's the American trope for Street Fighter.
But that's just a theory! A GAME TH -- I'll shut up...
what exactly is threatening the 'American Freedom' ?
Taxes on tea, Nazis, and the USSR
and Mexicans _See's Mordikaiser next to him with his mace_ I MEAN TRUMP, YES TRUMP, HE IS A BAD MAN _Please don't ghost me Mordikaiser..._
